text: I added a new feature to "FeedLand" today. There's now a white-on-orange XML icon in the upper right corner of each news product. Screen shot and example. The icon links to the OPML subscription list for the feeds on the page. This came from a question on the thread, basically asking "Where are the feeds." I love those kinds of questions, they help direct the development of a product. My perspective is so muddled, I've been living with this product for nine months already. I can't see what it looks like to someone seeing it for the first time.
